description:
Chrome is still in a coma in the Vongola hideout`s intensive care unit. She is desperately trying to wake up from her dream. Hibari has moved his battle into the subway, and continues to fight the Millefiore`s troops and detached forces who have appeared. In the Merone Base, Tsuna is wondering whether to accept Spanner`s help to complete his X Burner. Meanwhile, Gokudera impresses Gamma with his Sistema C.A.I.. It was very agonizing process for Gokudera to fully understand the complex Sistema C.A.I.…
Source: crunchyroll
